nio/Sort.description: The Sort block orders a list of incoming signals based on the attribute configured in the **sort key** property.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Limit the length of the the emitted signal list after sorting. If the incoming list is longer than the limit, all items after the limit length will be discarded.

reverse.title: Reverse
reverse.description: If true (checked) the list will be sorted in reverse order.

sort_by.title: Sort Key
sort_by.description: The value used for sorting on each signal.
